activities:
* We provide hosting services and data management services to schools and school districts utilizing our educational software and training.  Information would include student names, test scores, demographic information, as well as, teacher name and contact information.  
* We provide data analysis, technology consulting, program design, and project administration for teachers and administrators on the effective use of our learning information systems. 
* Our EU offices provide Employee information related to wages, salaries and benefits and contact information.
* Customer names, and contact information is collected for Customer Relationship Management purposes.
recoursemech: AAA - American Arbitration Association for non-human resources data; European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for human resources data only.
